attributes.action: Ban the "fag break" I am calling on the Government to put in a deadline for people to give up smoking or lose their extra break no one else can have.
attributes.additional_details: People that smoke have had enough time to give up  since the Ban in the work place was inforced. Now it has turned into a privalage to smoke because you get an extra break, I am calling on the Government to now put in a deadline for people to give up smoking or lose their extra break no one else has.
